alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 1:31PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Aitkin and northeastern Crow Wing Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 131 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Emily, to 11 miles northeast of Cuyuna, to Aitkin, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Aitkin around 135 PM CDT. Palisade around 200 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Waukenabo, Cedar Lake, Gun Lake, Little Pine, Ripple Lake, Glory, White Elk Lake, Esquagamah Lake, Waldeck and Glen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
